features: Individually wrapped splinter revmovers are easy and convenient to use
10 stainless steel splinter removers per box
body.description: First Aid Only Splinter-Out with 10 splinter removers per box. The Stainless Steel Splinter Removers have a tri-bevel point designed for loosening and pulling out splinters. The splinter removers are sterile, individually wrapped in a reusable, hinged, hard plastic protective case. The Splinter-Out pack is ideal for a first aid kit or as a stand alone supply.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #34,015 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #81 in First Aid Kits (Health & Household)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: First Aid Refills Keeping your first aid kit or cabinet fully stocked is very important. First Aid Only offers a full selection of refill items to meet all your first aid needs. The individual boxes are perfectly sized for any application and can be used in both a first aid kit or as a stand-alone refill.

About Unitized Refill Boxes Feature 1: ANSI Color Guide Packaging Consistent color-coded packaging matches ANSI recommendations for easy identification when the user needs to find a first aid supply to treat an injury or know what to reorder for their kit. Feature 2: Organization Each unitized box is shrink-wrapped to keep product contained during shipping. Feature 3: Simplification Unit boxes simplify finding what you need in an emergency, as well as when you need to restock. Feature 4: Flexibility Missing a refill box in your First Aid Kit or Cabinet? The First Aid Only unitized refill boxes come in a variety of sizes to help you select the refill you need when replenishing your cabinet. The interchangeable refill boxes allow you to customize your kit or cabinet to meet the needs for a wide range of industries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyone Needs These
reviews.reviewText: My husband used these at work and always told me how good they were, but I had no idea how good until I got a small splinter (I think it was a thistle from baling hay or straw). This little product GREAT. it has the sharp end to open the skin and then the curved sides to help scrape out the splinter if needed. I now have them in the first aid kits in the vehicles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great even on small splinters
reviews.reviewText: Just had the chance to use one of these splinter outs. They're very pointed and sharp. I had a small round splinter in the side of my hand and this was ideal to get it out. Not painless necessarily but better than letting it fester. Buy a pack of these and put them away in a little first aid bag for when you need them. You won't regret it. 👍🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to keep in all of your first aid kits.
reviews.reviewText: These are great to keep in all of your first aid kits, glove boxes, toolboxs medicine chests or in the shop. Perfect for removing splinters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I took one of these things out of the package (they are single use items) and was disappointed when I first saw it
reviews.reviewText: This is nothing more than a lancet, but it works. Both of my kids have cars now, and are heading off to college, so I have been buying first aid kits to put in their cars. They gave me the "mom-roll-eye" treatments, but soon after buying the first aid kits (like the next day) they were used by their friends, not once but twice in one day.I saw this, and read the write up and thought "what the heck" and ordered it. The very day it came in the mail, I had to pick up a small piece of plywood and lo and behold, I got a HUGE splinter in my hand. Not the little splinter you usually get, but the big plank type. I took one of these things out of the package (they are single use items) and was disappointed when I first saw it. I guess I was hoping for a miracle splinter extractor. It is not that....just a lancet, or metal plank with a metal point on the end. But it is razor sharp. You simple cut the skin on top of the splinter and lift the splinter out. The thing that makes this work is the flatness of the part you hold. A needle is small and round and difficult to hold, and the point is just a point. This is like a tiny knife, and it doesn't roll in your fingers. What would have been an hour or so event to get the splinter out, took just a few minutes once I figured out what I needed to do.So you use it to prick and slice the skin that is on top of the splinter to open up a channel so that the splinter lifts directly up.Very glad I ordered this on a whim. I haven't had a splinter in about 2 years, and the day this comes in the mail is the day I got one.I recommend buying burn gel also while you're at it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well, sterile, individually wrapped, single use splitter remover. Will use again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Woodworker and metal worker must.
reviews.reviewText: If you do any kind of woodworking or metalworking you will love these, I’ve been using them for years and I’m finally able to get them online so I always keep a pack in my toolbox. They’re individually wrapped so they are clean and they were great to get out a splinter or even a piece of metal shaving

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Once you get a feel for how they're meant to be used, you will never use anything else for splinters or thorns. They've saved me many hours of suffering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This works good.
reviews.reviewText: I have had a splinter for months that I couldn’t get out with a needle . I bought cream drawing but it didn’t come yet so decided to just try this splinter out and it worked great. I am really satisfied.

Bought these for my sister who works in a garage and her and coworkers get metal splinters and tear there fingers apart trying to get out a splinter well not any more they use these and in seconds splinters gone there great she wants more
Good to have if you need to pop a blister or remove a splinter, small and light and very useful
